game.title: Quest for the Golden Apple
game.objective: Find the Golden Apple in the Enchanted Forest.
game.description: The Golden Apple is said to grant eternal youth and vitality.
game.reward: A Golden Apple and 100 gold pieces.
game.quest-giver: Granny Rose, near the town square.

task.objective: Speak with Granny Rose and accept her quest.
task.description: Granny Rose will give you more information about the Golden Apple and where to find it in the Enchanted Forest.

task.objective: Find and speak with the Elder Tree in the Enchanted Forest.
task.description: The Elder Tree holds the key to finding the location of the Golden Apple.
task.location: Deep within the Enchanted Forest, near the crystal clear pool.

task.objective: Retrieve the Golden Apple from its guardian, the Griffon.
task.description: The Griffon guards the Golden Apple on a high cliff, overlooking the forest.
task.location: High atop the Cliff of Peril in the Enchanted Forest.
